entry.title: Friday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow mixed with ice pellets this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
